languages.text: {n}Он понижает голос и обращается к вам:{/n} "Я тебе, кстати, тоже поверю. Понятия не имею как ты планируешь бежать или хотя бы выжить, но ты уже не раз меня удивлял{mf||а}. Надеюсь, что это не какая-то злая шутка в отместку за мои прошлые... прегрешения. Очень некстати было бы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}вновь обрести веру в Императора{/d} только ради того, чтобы сдохнуть в Комморре. Хотя, безусловно, иронично — прежний я такое оценил бы. Удачи!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Он понижает голос и обращается к вам:{/n} "Я тебе, кстати, тоже поверю. Понятия не имею как ты планируешь бежать или хотя бы выжить, но ты уже не раз меня удивлял{mf||а}. Надеюсь, что это не какая-то злая шутка в отместку за мои прошлые... прегрешения. Очень некстати было бы вновь обрести веру в Императора только ради того, чтобы сдохнуть в Комморре. Хотя, безусловно, иронично — прежний я такое оценил бы. Удачи!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I'm going to put my faith in you too, you know. I have no idea how you plan on escaping or even surviving, but you've surprised me before on several occasions. I do hope this isn't some cruel joke to pay me back for my past... transgressions. It'd be a shame to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}rediscovered my faith in the Emperor{/d} only to die in Commorragh. I mean, it would certainly be ironic: the old me would have loved it. Good luck!"
languages.original_text: {n}Он понижает голос и обращается к вам:{/n} "Я тебе, кстати, тоже поверю. Понятия не имею как ты планируешь бежать или хотя бы выжить, но ты уже не раз меня удивлял{mf||а}. Надеюсь, что это не какая-то злая шутка в отместку за мои прошлые... прегрешения. Очень некстати было бы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}вновь обрести веру в Императора{/d} только ради того, чтобы сдохнуть в Комморре. Хотя, безусловно, иронично — прежний я такое оценил бы. Удачи!"

No idea how you plan to escape or at least survive, but you've surprised me before on several occasions. Sure hope this isn't some cruel joke to pay me back for my past... transgressions. I'd be a shame to have rediscovered my faith in the Emperor only to die in Commorragh. I mean, that would certainly be ironic — the former me would've loved it. Good luck!"

It'd be a shame to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}rediscovered my faith in the Emperor{/d} only to die in Commorragh. I mean, it would certainly be ironic: the old me would have loved it. Good luck!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}彼は小さな声で言う。{/n}「私も陛下に信頼を置かせていただきましょう。どう逃げるつもりなのか、少なくともどう生き残るつもりなのか、見当もつきませんが、陛下には以前にも何度か驚かされたことがあります。これが過去の罪に対する仕返しのための…残酷なジョークでないことを祈りますよ。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}皇帝への信仰を取り戻した{/d}のにコモラフで死んだら元も子もありません。というかそうなったら皮肉だ。かつての私なら喜んでいたでしょう。幸運を祈ります！」
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I'm going to put my faith in you too, you know. I have no idea how you plan on escaping or even surviving, but you've surprised me before on several occasions. I do hope this isn't some cruel joke to pay me back for my past... transgressions. It'd be a shame to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}rediscovered my faith in the Emperor{/d} only to die in Commorragh. I mean, it would certainly be ironic: the old me would have loved it. Good luck!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は小さな声で言う。{/n}「私も陛下に信頼を置かせていただきましょう。どう逃げるつもりなのか、少なくともどう生き残るつもりなのか、見当もつきませんが、陛下には以前にも何度か驚かされたことがあります。これが過去の罪に対する仕返しのための…残酷なジョークでないことを祈りますよ。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}皇帝への信仰を取り戻した{/d}のにコモラフで死んだら元も子もありません。というかそうなったら皮肉だ。かつての私なら喜んでいたでしょう。幸運を祈ります！」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}他压低了声音，对你开了口。{/n}“我也打算全听你的了。我不知道你到底打算怎么逃跑，或者打算怎么活下来，但你已经让我吃惊过好几次了。我希望这不是某种残酷的玩笑，为了报复我过去犯下的……罪过。如果我{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}重新找回了对帝皇的信仰{/d}，但却死在了科摩罗，那恐怕就太让人遗憾了。我是说，这恐怕就太讽刺了，以前的我肯定会喜欢这样的把戏。祝你好运！”
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I'm going to put my faith in you too, you know. I have no idea how you plan on escaping or even surviving, but you've surprised me before on several occasions. I do hope this isn't some cruel joke to pay me back for my past... transgressions. It'd be a shame to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}rediscovered my faith in the Emperor{/d} only to die in Commorragh. I mean, it would certainly be ironic: the old me would have loved it. Good luck!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他压低了声音，对你开了口。{/n}“老实说，我也相信你。我不知道你到底打算怎么逃跑，或者打算怎么活下来，但你已经让我吃惊过好几次了。我希望这不是某种残酷的玩笑，为了报复我过去犯下的……罪过。如果我重新找回了对帝皇的信仰，但却死在了科摩罗，那恐怕就太让人遗憾了。我是说，这恐怕就太讽刺了，以前的我肯定会喜欢这样的把戏。祝你好运！”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Baja la voz y te dice,{/n} «Yo también voy a creer en usted. Ni idea de cómo planea escapar o al menos sobrevivir, pero ya me ha sorprendido antes en varias ocasiones. Espero que esto no sea una broma cruel para vengarse por mis anteriores... infracciones. Sería una pena haber {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}redescubierto mi fe en el Emperador{/d} para morir en Commorragh. Aunque sería irónico: al antiguo yo le habría encantado. ¡Buena suerte!».
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I'm going to put my faith in you too, you know. I have no idea how you plan on escaping or even surviving, but you've surprised me before on several occasions. I do hope this isn't some cruel joke to pay me back for my past... transgressions. It'd be a shame to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}rediscovered my faith in the Emperor{/d} only to die in Commorragh. I mean, it would certainly be ironic: the old me would have loved it. Good luck!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Baja la voz y te dice,{/n} «Yo también voy a creerle. Ni idea de cómo planea escapar o al menos sobrevivir, pero ya me ha sorprendido antes en varias ocasiones. Espero que esto no sea una broma cruel para vengarse por mis anteriores... infracciones. Sería una pena haber redescubierto mi fe en el Emperador para morir en Commorragh. Aunque sería irónico: al antiguo yo le habría encantado. ¡Buena suerte!».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Er senkt die Stimme und sagt zu dir:{/n} "Auch ich werde meinen Glauben in Euch setzen, wisst Ihr. Ich weiß zwar nicht, wie Ihr entkommen oder wenigstens überleben wollt, aber Ihr habt mich schon mehrfach überrascht. Ich hoffe nur, das ist kein grausamer Scherz, um mich für meine ... Sünden zu bestrafen. Es wäre doch ein Jammer, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}meinen Glauben in den Imperator wiederzuentdecken{/d}, nur um dann in Commorragh zu sterben. Wobei es eine herrliche Ironie des Schicksals wäre. Mein altes Ich wäre begeistert gewesen. Viel Glück!"
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I'm going to put my faith in you too, you know. I have no idea how you plan on escaping or even surviving, but you've surprised me before on several occasions. I do hope this isn't some cruel joke to pay me back for my past... transgressions. It'd be a shame to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}rediscovered my faith in the Emperor{/d} only to die in Commorragh. I mean, it would certainly be ironic: the old me would have loved it. Good luck!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er senkt die Stimme und sagt zu dir:{/n} "Ich werde Euch glauben, wisst Ihr? Ich weiß nicht, wie Ihr entkommen oder zumindest überleben wollt, aber Ihr habt mich schon mehrfach überrascht. Ich hoffe nur, das ist kein grausamer Scherz, um mich für meine ... Sünden zu bestrafen. Es wäre doch ein Jammer, meinen Glauben in den Imperator wiederzuentdecken, nur um dann in Commorragh zu sterben. Aber es wäre auch herrliche Ironie des Schicksals, mein altes Ich hätte sich kaputtgelacht. Viel Glück!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: « Moi aussi, je vais vous faire confiance, vous savez, {n}vous confie-t-il dans un murmure.{/n} Je n'ai pas la moindre idée de ce que vous comptez faire pour vous en sortir, mais vous m'avez déjà surpris à une plus d'une occasion. J'espère simplement que ce n'est pas une mauvaise blague pour me faire payer mes... transgressions. Ce serait vraiment dommage que je crève comme un rat sur Commorragh juste après avoir {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}retrouvé foi en l'Empereur{/d}. Cela dit, mon ancien moi apprécierait l'ironie de la chose. Bonne chance ! »
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I'm going to put my faith in you too, you know. I have no idea how you plan on escaping or even surviving, but you've surprised me before on several occasions. I do hope this isn't some cruel joke to pay me back for my past... transgressions. It'd be a shame to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}rediscovered my faith in the Emperor{/d} only to die in Commorragh. I mean, it would certainly be ironic: the old me would have loved it. Good luck!"

traits.locale_text: « Moi aussi, je vais vous croire, vous savez, {n}vous confie-t-il dans un murmure.{/n} Je n'ai pas la moindre idée de ce que vous comptez faire pour vous en sortir, mais vous m'avez déjà surpris par le passé, et à une plus d'une occasion. J'espère simplement que ce n'est pas une mauvaise blague pour me faire payer mes... transgressions. Ce serait vraiment dommage que je crève comme un rat sur Commorragh juste après avoir retrouvé foi en l'Empereur. Cela dit, mon ancien moi apprécierait l'ironie de la chose. Bonne chance ! »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Sesini alçaltıp sana dönüyor.{/n} "Bu arada benim de size inancım yerinde. Buradan nasıl kaçmayı, hatta nasıl hayatta kalmayı planladığınızı hiç bilmiyorum ama daha önce beni defalarca hayrete düşürdünüz. Umarım geçmişteki günahlarımın bedeli olarak insafsızlık edip benimle dalga geçmiyorsunuzdur. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}İmparator'a olan inancımı yeniden bulduktan sonra{/d} Commorragh'ta ölmem çok yazık, en azından ironik olur. Eskiden olsa çok isterdim. Bol şans!"
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his voice and says to you,{/n} "I'm going to put my faith in you too, you know. I have no idea how you plan on escaping or even surviving, but you've surprised me before on several occasions. I do hope this isn't some cruel joke to pay me back for my past... transgressions. It'd be a shame to have {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}rediscovered my faith in the Emperor{/d} only to die in Commorragh. I mean, it would certainly be ironic: the old me would have loved it. Good luck!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kısık sesle seninle konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu arada, benim de sana inancım yerinde. Buradan nasıl kaçmayı, hatta nasıl hayatta kalmayı planladığını bile hiç bilmiyorum ama daha önce kaç kez beni hayrete düşürdün sonuçta. Umarım geçmişteki günahlarımın bedeli olarak insafsızca benimle dalga geçmiyorsundur. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_ComissarRedeemed}İmparator'a olan inancıma yeniden kavuştuktan sonra{/d} Commorragh'ta ölsem çok yazık olur. En azından ironik olur diyebilirim: Eskiden olsa bu işe bayılırdım. Bol şans!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
